en: Fill 75% of the board without getting hit!

Fill 75% of the board to advance to the next level.

Tap or click anywhere to build a wall in that direction.
Swipe to choose the wall direction.

Walls start from the edge of the board or from an existing wall.

Don't let the ball hit a wall while it's still being built!

You have three spare lives per level, one live recovers each level.

You get bonus points for
- filling more than 75%
- each life you keep.
